Package com.ait_31_2.doctor_appointment_app.security.security_service

Class TokenService

java.lang.Object
com.ait_31_2.doctor_appointment_app.security.security_service.TokenService
@Service public class TokenService extends Object
Service class for managing authentication tokens. Handles token generation, validation, and retrieval of token claims.

  • Constructor Details

    • TokenService

      public TokenService(@Value("${access.key}") String accessKey, @Value("${refresh.key}") String refreshKey, RoleRepository roleRepository)
      Constructs an instance of TokenService with the specified dependencies.
      Parameters:
      accessKey - The access key used for generating access tokens.
      refreshKey - The refresh key used for generating refresh tokens.
      roleRepository - The RoleRepository instance for retrieving user roles.

  • Method Details

    • generateAccessToken

      public String generateAccessToken(@Nonnull User user)
      Generates an access token for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      user - The User for whom the access token is generated.
      Returns:
      The generated access token.

    • generateRefreshToken

      public String generateRefreshToken(@Nonnull User user)
      Generates a refresh token for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      user - The User for whom the refresh token is generated.
      Returns:
      The generated refresh token.

    • validateAccessToken

      public boolean validateAccessToken(@Nonnull String accessToken)
      Validates an access token.
      Parameters:
      accessToken - The access token to validate.
      Returns:
      True if the access token is valid, false otherwise.

    • validateRefreshToken

      public boolean validateRefreshToken(@Nonnull String refreshToken)
      Validates a refresh token.
      Parameters:
      refreshToken - The refresh token to validate.
      Returns:
      True if the refresh token is valid, false otherwise.

    • getAccessClaims

      public io.jsonwebtoken.Claims getAccessClaims(@Nonnull String accessToken)
      Retrieves claims from an access token.
      Parameters:
      accessToken - The access token from which to retrieve claims.
      Returns:
      The claims extracted from the access token.

    • getRefreshClaims

      public io.jsonwebtoken.Claims getRefreshClaims(@Nonnull String refreshToken)
      Retrieves claims from a refresh token.
      Parameters:
      refreshToken - The refresh token from which to retrieve claims.
      Returns:
      The claims extracted from the refresh token.

    • generateAuthInfo

      public AuthInfo generateAuthInfo(io.jsonwebtoken.Claims claims)
      Generates authentication information based on token claims.
      Parameters:
      claims - The claims extracted from a token.
      Returns:
      The AuthInfo object containing authentication details.
